extendedInfo.description: Menâs Divorce Source makes it easy to stay on top of your divorce and ensure you achieve the best possible outcome with your divorce attorney. Divorce Goals Assistant allows you to outline your divorce goals securely. What do you want your child custody schedule to be? How should your assets be divided? How much will your divorce cost? Share your goals with your divorce attorney or download a copy. Features include: â¢ Divorce Goals Assistant allows you to outline your divorce goals. â¢ Download and email your divorce goals to your divorce attorney. â¢ Over 3,000 in-depth family law articles! â¢ Over 5,000 ask a lawyer questions answered! â¢ Locate divorce attorneys near you. The Menâs Divorce Source App is constantly updated with new capabilities and content! Questions or feedback? Email us at appsupport@cordelllaw.com. We are always looking for ideas to improve the App and provide the best experience possible on your iPad and iPhone.

reviews.title: Helpful goal building
reviews.comment: Used the goals part of the app before my first attorney meeting, he was impressed with how prepared I was.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: AAA app for those in need of this sort of reference.  Its appears to have been professionally developed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just a ploy to sell their booklet/list
reviews.comment: If you have zero organization skills or are unable to grasp the most basic concepts of a divorce, this app could help...  They may have a good firm, or not....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: A Dad\'s Rights are so discriminated against in court WE need all the help WE can get!!
